GSD.product_version: versions from v3.12 to before v5.18.15
GSD.description:
tcp: Fix a data-race around sysctl_tcp_notsent_lowat.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.15 by commit 62e56cfeb2ae4b53ae9ca24c80f54093250ce64a, it was introduced in version v3.12 by commit c9bee3b7fdecb0c1d070c7b54113b3bdfb9a3d36. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: tcp: Fix a data-race around sysctl_tcp_notsent_lowat.
